name: Rage of the Dragons
description: Rage of the Dragons is a 2002 tag team head-to-head fighting game released for the Neo Geo hardware by Playmore. The game was developed by Japanese company Noise Factory, co-developed by BrezzaSoft and chiefly-designed by the Mexican team Evoga. As of May 11, 2020, Piko Interactive has acquired the game’s IP and has expressed interest in using it in some way. Ports for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5, and Xbox One and Xbox Series is scheduled for a future release, ported by QUByte Interactive.
